Whispers of the Fey.name: Whispers of the Fey
Whispers of the Fey.fullText:
Feytouched Attack 20Whispers of the Fey

The disquieting whispers of fey spirits surround you, filling the minds of nearby enemies with deranged thoughts and provoking them to turn on their allies.

Daily        Arcane, Charm, Implement, Psychic
Standard Action      Close burst 5

Target: Each enemy in the burst

Attack: Charisma vs. Will

Hit: The target must make a basic attack as a free action against its nearest ally (you choose the target if there are multiple possible targets). If it can’t make the attack, the target takes 2d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage After it makes its attack or takes psychic damage, the target is dazed (save ends).


Update (8/15/2011)
Updated in Class Compendium.

Published in Player's Handbook, page(s) 141, Class Compendium.
Whispers of the Fey.flavor: The disquieting whispers of fey spirits surround you, filling the minds of nearby enemies with deranged thoughts and provoking them to turn on their allies.
Whispers of the Fey.onHit: The target must make a basic attack as a free action against its nearest ally (you choose the target if there are multiple possible targets). If it can’t make the attack, the target takes 2d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage After it makes its attack or takes psychic damage, the target is dazed (save ends).

Twilight Teleport.name: Twilight Teleport
Twilight Teleport.fullText:
Feytouched Utility 12Twilight Teleport

An enemy falls to your curse, and another creature appears in its place, surrounded by motes of twilight.

Daily        Arcane, Teleportation
Free Action      Ranged 20

Trigger: A creature within range and affected by your Warlock’s Curse drops to 0 hit points or fewer

Effect: You teleport yourself or another creature in range into the triggering creature’s space.


Update (8/15/2011)
Updated in Class Compendium.

Published in Player's Handbook, page(s) 141, Class Compendium.
Twilight Teleport.flavor: An enemy falls to your curse, and another creature appears in its place, surrounded by motes of twilight.
Twilight Teleport.trigger: A creature within range and affected by your Warlock’s Curse drops to 0 hit points or fewer
Twilight Teleport.effect: You teleport yourself or another creature in range into the triggering creature’s space.

Will of the Feywild.name: Will of the Feywild
Will of the Feywild.fullText:
Feytouched Attack 11Will of the Feywild

You bend your enemy’s will to your whim. In a blinding flash of golden light, the creature teleports to a location you designate and, in its madness, attacks one of its allies.

Encounter        Arcane, Charm, Implement, Psychic, Teleportation
Standard Action      Ranged 10

Target: One creature

Attack: Charisma vs. Will

Hit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage. You can teleport the target 5 squares, whereupon it makes a melee basic attack against an adjacent creature of your choice.


Update (8/15/2011)
Updated in Class Compendium.

Published in Player's Handbook, page(s) 141, Class Compendium.
Will of the Feywild.flavor: You bend your enemy’s will to your whim. In a blinding flash of golden light, the creature teleports to a location you designate and, in its madness, attacks one of its allies.
Will of the Feywild.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage. You can teleport the target 5 squares, whereupon it makes a melee basic attack against an adjacent creature of your choice.
